mean_cn: n. 决心，确定，决定，果断，定位
mean_en: a quality that makes you continue trying to do or achieve something even when it is difficult
word_etyma: determin决定 + ation名词后缀 → determination 决定
short_phrase: determination to run a long race
sentence: "I have great determination to lose weight." said the big girl.
sentence_trans: 那个胖女孩说：”我是下了很大决心要减肥的！“
